Title: I Robot, You Jane
Plot: Feeling lonely, Willow turns to a chatroom and meets a charming boy online. She ignores Buffy's concerns about Internet freaks as the rest of the gang discover a new type of demon.
GuestStars: Mark Deakins, Damon Sharp, Edith Fields, Pierrino Mascarino, Joss Whedon, Robia LaMorte, Chad Lindberg, Jamison Ryan
